## Description {#details}

Header of lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>.

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lower null pointers in private and local address space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clang generates addrspacecast for null pointers in private and local</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// address space, which needs to be lowered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcAddr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType()-&gt;getPointerAddressSpace();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;isNullValue() &amp;&amp; AT.getNullPointerValue(SrcAddr) == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DstAddr = CE-&gt;getType()-&gt;getPointerAddressSpace();</Highlight></CodeLine>
